moving

Class AssetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • moving.AssetManager

  • public class AssetManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class loads and stores ALL IMAGES in the entire game. It makes it very easy to manage all the images and pull images from a compact location. Also, solves image "reload" problems. Since the methods in this class are all static, this class does not need to be constructed and thus we did not include the default constructor.

      • getItem

        public static Item getItem(java.lang.String s)
        Given a String, fetches the item associated with that String. If no item is found, this returns null.
        Parameters:
        s - The name of the item to get.
        Returns:
        The Item represented by the String.
